languages.text: "Да. Мой брат говорил об этом ясно. Годы назад Амарнат был приближен к Вольному Торговцу Теодоре, но позже их пути разошлись".
"Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."
languages.original_text: "Да. Мой брат говорил об этом ясно. Годы назад Амарнат был приближен к Вольному Торговцу Теодоре, но позже их пути разошлись".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

"Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."
"Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

languages.text: 「ああ、彼はそうした。兄弟の言葉は明瞭だった。数年前、アマルナトはローグトレーダー、シオドーラの執行会の一員だった。お互い袂を分かつまでは」
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、彼はそうした。兄弟の言葉は明瞭だった。数年前、アマルナトはローグトレーダー、シオドーラの執行会の一員だった。お互い袂を分かつまでは」

languages.text: “没错，我的兄弟说的非常清楚。多年前，阿玛纳特曾是行商浪人西奥多拉核心圈子中的一员，但后来他们分道扬镳了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我的兄弟说的非常清楚。多年前，阿玛纳特曾是行商浪人西奥多拉核心圈子中的一员，但后来他们分道扬镳了。”

languages.text: "Ja. Die Worte meines Bruders waren unmissverständlich. Amarnat war vor Jahren Teil des inneren Zirkels der Freihändlerin Theodora, bevor ihre Wege sich trennten."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Die Worte meines Bruders waren unmissverständlich. Amarnat war vor Jahren Teil des inneren Zirkels der Freihändlerin Theodora, bevor ihre Wege sich trennten."

languages.text: « En effet. Mon frère a été très clair à ce sujet. Avant que leurs chemins ne se séparent, Amarnat faisait partie du cercle rapproché de Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Mon frère a été très clair à ce sujet. Avant que leurs chemins ne se séparent, Amarnat faisait partie du cercle rapproché de Théodora. »

languages.text: «Así es. Las palabras de mi hermano fueron claras a ese respecto. Hace unos años, Amarnat formó parte del círculo interior de la Comerciante Independiente Theodora, antes de que sus caminos se separasen».
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Las palabras de mi hermano fueron claras a ese respecto. Hace unos años, Amarnat formó parte del círculo interior de la Comerciante Independiente Theodora, antes de que sus caminos se separasen».

languages.text: "Evet. Kardeşim bu hususta oldukça netti. Amarnat, uzun yıllar evvel Hür Tacir Theodora'nın yakın çevresine dâhilmiş. Sonrasında yolları ayrılmış."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. My brother's words on this were clear. Years ago, Amarnat was part of Rogue Trader Theodora's inner circle, before their ways parted."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Kardeşim bu hususta oldukça netti. Amarnat, uzun yıllar evvel Hür Tacir Theodora'nın yakın çevresine dâhilmiş. Sonrasında yolları ayrılmış."
